source.name: Cassavabase
source.description: In addition to cassava phenotypic and genotypic data Cassavabase also offers access to all Genomic Selection analysis tools and phenotyping tools developed by the NEXTGEN Cassava project, as well as links to auxiliary genome browser, ontology tools and social networking tools for the cassava community.  Cassavabase aims to provide a "one-stop shop" for cassava researchers and breeders worldwide.
